Package de.intarsys.tools.randomaccess

Interface Summary
IRandomAccess An interface for an object that can randomly access bytes in a data stream.
 

Class Summary
AbstractRandomAccess Supports reading and writing to a random access data container.
BufferedRandomAccess todo 1 length reply may be invalid
PACKAGE  
RandomAccessByteArray A wrapper around a byte array to allow random access like API.
RandomAccessFile Implements random access to a file.
RandomAccessFilter Filter implementation for random access.
RandomAccessViewport A viewport in an existing IRandomAccess.
